channel.title: First on Pedro Trejo
channel.description: Recent content in First on Pedro Trejo

item.title: Why me?
item.description: “If I have seen further than others, it is by standing on the shoulders of giants.” - Sir Isaac Newton Why do I want to be mentored? Eight years of professional experience and I’ve had a handful of impactful mentors.The mentoring I’ve taken part of has made me a better technical worker along with a more well rounded person. It’s invaluable to see how a professional approaches a problem.
